import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import {menuList} from '../menuList' const Menu = () => { console.log(menuList) const [category,setCategory]= useState('breakfast'); const filterMenu = (e)=>{ console.log(e.target) } return (
Our Menu
Breakfast
setCategory('lunch')}>Lunch
{ menuList.map((item)=>( category === item.category ? (
{item.name}
${item.price}
{item.description}
) :"" )) }
) } export default Menu
